website_summaries.verdict: This classic, high-quality option will save you money and space while still offering great functionality.
pros: The low-profile design is great if you want a classic look in your billiard room
Buyers rave about the snap-in design for pool cues
cons: The screws seem a little small for mounting the product to the wall, but this can be remedied

customer_reviews.title: Warning:  If you use the rack as-is, your cues will not be aligned properly and you run the risk of warping/bowing your cue
customer_reviews.text: How do I say this politely? Its like the guy who made the bottom part of the rack used the metric system (cm) and the guy who made the top half the imperial system (inches). If you put both parts on top of each other they will not be centered. After fixing this its functional. The stain isn't great but you get what you pay for and my friend was still appreciative. In the end, if you care about your cues take the time (30 minutes) to unscrew each clip and properly align them with bottom portion of the cue rack.
customer_reviews.author: K C

customer_reviews.title: You may not get what you ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two and they sent me two different items. I need these to match. One was longer and shaped differently and with a different paint then the other one. Both black and hold six cues but everything else is different . I’ve requested a replacement but have no idea what I’m going to get. This is delayed my custom cue rack project.
customer_reviews.author: Corniceman

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but terrible manufacturing tolerances make proper installation a hassle.
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done, but terrible manufacturing tolerances made proper installation much more difficult than it needed to be. In particular, the mounting holes on the 4 units I installed were all significantly misaligned, which made installing the drywall anchors so that the racks were level and even into a painstaking process. Note that the included drywall anchors are also very low quality. I used better ones from a hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Peskin

customer_reviews.title: Wood Pool cue holders are excellent value :)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pool stick rack to add to my pool room I recently completed. This is a very simple design, and made very well. The wood is real wood, imagine that. Once installed it has a nice look and is relatively simple to install. I would highly recommend using a stud finder to ensure at least one end of each piece is securely fastened to the wall. Also be sure to use a tape measure to properly ensure you will have the proper distance from top to bottom. This is a very neat and tidy solution to ensuring your prized pool cue's are displayed properly, and out of harms way.
customer_reviews.author: Timoteo

customer_reviews.title: great inexpensive pool stick holder
customer_reviews.text: hold our 5 sticks nice and tight and looks great. easy to assemble, just screw mount into wall with screws or supplied sheetrock molly
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wall

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the price. It mounted easily and holds the stick securely. Make sure to mount it properly or you will break the clips.
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Second times the charm
customer_reviews.text: It was cost effective for the most part. Looks ok. I actually ordered this a second time due the warped wood on my first order. The wood was so warped and twisted that it would not mount flush on the wall. Second times the charm.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Meng

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Solid wood; very well made; finish is good; outstanding product for the price. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Ray J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the screw holes should be 16” apart so it can screw straight into studs.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: The clasps that you put the pool cues in break very easily. Only one of them has not broken yet.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Teel

customer_reviews.title: Cheep and awesome
customer_reviews.text: Only bad thing is it's made in China. But for 10 dollars your getting solid wood, stained, clips. Can you really complain about anything?
customer_reviews.author: Kyle P.

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice pool rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice pool rack. It seems to hold up pretty well to normal wear and tear. For commercial use the plastic stick holders can break off during heavy use. Otherwise, initially finish looks good, easy to attach .
customer_reviews.author: nu_football

customer_reviews.title: Nice finish
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this cue rack for a basement with a similar finish installed very easily would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Gadgets

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents game room. They love it. I’d recommend this for anyone who has a pool table!
customer_reviews.author: Amresh G.

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a few of these and it suited my purpose holding my pool cues.
customer_reviews.author: Vireshwar Gosine

customer_reviews.title: Nice finish, a few minor flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice finish and easy to install. The upper mount that I received seemed to be slightly warped and one of the clips on it is slightly twisted (not so much that it won’t hold the cue though).
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Cheap garbage doesn't even lineup
customer_reviews.text: I don't think the two pieces are made for each other because when you put the stick in the bottom slot to line up with the top, it's crooked and has nothing to do with how I mounted it because if you get one stuck straight the next one's crooked. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Picone

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: The looks of the wall rack impressed me and for the price I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin P.

customer_reviews.title: Good price point and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to do. Good price point and easy to put together. I didn't expect it to be super fancy or anything. Just wanted a place to put our pool sticks.
customer_reviews.author: K. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Cue holders are not straight. Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Cue holders are not straight. Poor quality control. Had to drill new holes.
customer_reviews.author: chungasos

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend these. I tried contacting the seller
customer_reviews.text: There is a big hole in the rack that was filled with putty and painted over. I do not recommend these. I tried contacting the seller, but the didn't respond.
customer_reviews.author: D. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: This was the cheapest cue holder i could find on amazon at the time. I must say I am satisfied, very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Hiren

customer_reviews.title: Good quality pool cue rack.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pool cue wall rack, The plastic clips that hold the cue at the top are very good heavy quality. I like it. My cues are secure and do not fall out of this baby.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Folen

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Those that complained that some clips broke, Really! At this price, buy two and you will have back up clips. Works well for me, and is 20X's cheaper than the so called good one I bought.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it's supposed to. Looks nice, easy to install, great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Higareda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Used it for several months now and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brewskii

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I have extra billiard sticks and needed this rack for a small space. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: norma

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install and perfect for what we needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Malissa Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Super easy to install. I went from a floor stand to this wall mount to save floor space in my game room, I ordered 2 because I have a total of 10 sticks and it only holds 6. I hung them side by side.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: STICK IT ON THE WALL
customer_reviews.text: Needed to hang my bridge and short cues. This does the trick well. I miss placed the screw hole plugs or didn't look through the packaging as thoroughly as I should have.... Good product. Buy one, you'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Really great stick holder, especially for the price. My BF loved how easy it was to put up.
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, and simple
customer_reviews.text: These cue stick holders were exactly what we needed - low profile, sturdy, and simple. Like others, we chose to use our own mounting hardware to ensure a secure fit to the wall. I LOVE that the cue sticks snap right in instead having to thread them through a hole. I would 100% buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Rina Davison

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT.
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this wall rack for the price. Took me 2 minutes to screw it into the wall, looks fantastic. Would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christian C.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Wall mounting hardware was insufficient; I had to use larger moly screws. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: sheldania

customer_reviews.title: Good for a laugh
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest, lowest quality product. Crooked screws and chipped cracked wood spray painted black, made decent kindling to start a fire. It would ruin pool cues if used.
customer_reviews.author: Justin F

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on my wall, was easy to install, and holds all of my cues.
customer_reviews.author: deputy

customer_reviews.title: ... on the side of a cabinet and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I installed it on the side of a cabinet and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cpeterson

customer_reviews.title: Decent product.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but you can say it is cheaply made. But good thing is you do not notice it until you touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous_eng

customer_reviews.title: Poor design and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Looks nothing like the picture and holes for hanging do not mine up or match
customer_reviews.author: Cara Burgess

customer_reviews.title: nice rack!
customer_reviews.text: I got two of them! The first one went up with ease, the second one needed a couple longer screws. It fit my needs and I might end up getting a third one at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I saved a lot of wall space with this holder. Looks nice and clean
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice to have something to cover the holes of the screws!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly and looks great in our game room!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gift for son-in-law to hold pool table sticks no problems.

customer_reviews.title: easy to put up and exactly what I needed for ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy to put up and exactly what I needed for behind a dark stained door. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted! Fits perfect in a small area
customer_reviews.author: Erica B. Turansky

customer_reviews.title: Pool stick holder
customer_reviews.text: Works as indicated in the description. Perfect on the man cave wall.
customer_reviews.author: PriceKids03

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty good. BYOMH (Bring Your Own Mounting Hardware)
customer_reviews.text: This item looks pretty good for the price. The mounting hardware is junk which required a trip to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Denogginizer

customer_reviews.title: Cue stick rack
customer_reviews.text: Does the job serves the purpose Small for not so many sticks.

customer_reviews.title: Good product....!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Very well made. It serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Malkan

customer_reviews.title: Nice cue stick holder!
customer_reviews.text: Its a great price and compact! Easy to install and out of the way! Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: FforFabulous

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, but the grips on the top bar don't align plumb with the divots on the bottom bar. So the que sticks don't stand plumb with one another.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Functionality is good but color is off
customer_reviews.text: The color from one piece to the other is off.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Nystrom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and solid wood
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, solid wood, looks good and holds the pool cues without any issues.

customer_reviews.title: 6 pool cute wall rack
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in son's game room! It's a quality item, exactly like the photo, very pleased with this item. Would recommend to everyone!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The clips on the top bar seem to be getting loose, but they are used a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. Worked perfectly with slippery silk satin sheets that were riding up on a daily basis.

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Just exactly what I need to complete my pool area, got it on the estimated delivery time and match my pool table color. The clips are perfect for my purposes. Totally recommended!

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: The cue rack serves it's purpose but I was disappointed, and frustrated, that it needed longer screws than the ones that were included and that there were no wooden plugs to conceal the screw holes.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the price... I needed a quick fix for getting my pool cues out of the corner.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: What we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the small area that is was installed in. Holds ques securly and looks great. Painted it grey to match woodwork.

customer_reviews.title: Good rack

customer_reviews.title: Try another
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the stained finish is terrible. I had to completly sand and refinish to make look decent prior to mounting.

customer_reviews.title: ... barrels of my rifles and this did the trick like it was designed for it
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to hold the barrels of my rifles and this did the trick like it was designed for it. Still haven't figured out a use for the bottom portion. Good quality and nice finish to the stain and varnish.

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Even for the price what arrived is terrible. It wasn’t fully painted. The bottom portion, the round bits are too small for our cues. It’s very small.

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap quality, shown as a substantial 15 pounds, at most it weights 1 pound.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap quality, shown as a substantial 15 pounds, at most it weights 1 pound. Cheap made in China.

product_meta.title: Standard 6 Pool Cue Stained Wood Wall Rack with Clips
product_meta.description:
2 piece wall rack with clips that holds 6 cues. Available in chocolate, honey, midnight and wine stains.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
2 piece wall rack with clips that holds 6 cues. Available in chocolate, honey, midnight and wine stains.
